name: fleece production, polyethylene | fleece, polyethylene | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7983/documentation

The functional unit represents 1 kg of fleece out of polyethylene.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Raw materials and chemicals used for production, transport of materials to manufacturing plant, energy consumption and waste amounts from a company. Infrastructure of the plant as an approximation.
category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/139:Manufacture of other textiles/1399:Manufacture of other textiles n.e.c.

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: data from 1 Swiss company are used for the European average
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: technology used within Europe in the beginning of the 90s
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see geography This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Process data based on data from 1 Swiss  company, used here as average data for European situation.
